name: dosa, inc.
biography: Dosa is a clothing, accessories and housewares line founded and designed by Christina Kim.  At dosa, design, production, shipping, and showroom exist in one open space in downtown Los Angeles.  Many of the products and textiles at dosa are developed with traditional artisans from around the world.  Their handmade porjects are labor intensive rather than resources intensive, and combine traditional techniques with new designs.  The collboration broadens markets for communities of skilled craftspeople, helping to keep traditions alive, and providing them with steady incomes.
